document_data.name: Divine Romantic Interest
document_data.mainbody: '''''Divine romantic interest''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Hanali Celanil]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell allowed the caster to determine the romantic interest (or interests) of a targeted creature. The spell worked best when the caster touched a willing creature. The spell was unable to reveal to the caster if the targeted creature had a romantic interest in the caster.
document_data.Components: This spell required only a [[somatic component]].
